subtasks: Check the expiration date of the seed packet
Verify the number of seeds in the packet
Add stones or gravel to containers
Plant seeds at the recommended depth
Consider cross-pollination when planting other corn varieties
Plan the location for planting with sufficient warmth and sun exposure
Consider using seeds for feeding chickens if there is surplus
Monitor the germination process and provide updates

tasks.task: Checking seed quality and company integrity
subtasks: Verify number of seeds against packet claims
Contact seed supplier about underdelivered seeds
Document issues with seed counts for potential action
Research seed providers' practices regarding seed quantity
